name: Day of Juniper
description:
Our protagonist Juniper lives in a post-apocalyptic world where there isn't much greenery left and pollution has taken over. On a walk, she stumbles upon a potato plant and goes on a journey to deliver it to a seed bank where it will be kept safe. Juniper discovers many more plants outside the city for the first time in her lifetime, giving her a fresh colorful start.

Controls
  • A/D to move left/right
  • Space to jump
  • E to interact/pickup/talk
Installation Instructions
  • Download the RAR file, extract it, and run the executable (.exe).
Repository Link

https://github.com/ArnabitAkhdar/the-jam-jar

Tools Used

  • Game Engine - Unity Game Engine
  • Project Management - Trello
